item.title: ::master command help

item.description:
@deery50 wrote:

hmm…try this

	if (command.startsWith("master") && (playerRights >= 1)) {

addSkillXP(13100000, 0);

item.title: ::master command help
item.dc:creator: @deery50 deery50
item.description:
@deery50 wrote:

Hello, Try this

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && playerRights >= 1) {
for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
addSkillXP(13100000, i);
}
}

Read full topic
